issue.title: Building editor: crash when creating walls on a new level

content.raw:
A way around this is introduced on pull request #1214 - the user is [not allowed to add levels](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/1214/building-editor-import-background-image/diff#Lgazebo/gui/building/EditorView.ccT866) unless there are some walls already.

Just noticed another problem though. If the user deletes all the walls of a level, newly added levels get mixed up (but I didn't observe any crashes).
